title: Digital Marketer – E-commerce | SMM | Lead Generation
job_overview:
Important: Kindly read through to the end for detailed application instructions.

Who are we?

SelfBuild3D is a leading Irish company revolutionizing the self-build and home improvement industry through innovative digital solutions. We empower individuals to design, plan, and visualize their dream homes using advanced 3D renderings, value engineering strategies, and smart building workflows.

At SelfBuild3D, we’ve built efficient systems to deliver high-quality, in-house construction design and planning services. Our mission is to simplify the building process while ensuring precision, efficiency, and outstanding results.

We are now looking for a creative and data-driven Digital Marketer to join our growing remote team. In this role, you'll be responsible for driving brand awareness, lead generation, and digital engagement across various channels. You'll work closely with our design, sales, and technical teams to craft compelling campaigns that connect with self-builders across Ireland and beyond.

Your digital marketing expertise will play a key role in helping us reach more homeowners and grow our presence in the self-build community.

Responsibilities:

Develop and execute digital marketing strategies, including content creation, campaign management, and performance tracking.
Manage and optimize paid advertising campaigns across Facebook, Instagram, and Google.
Lead email marketing initiatives using best practices to nurture leads and drive conversions.
Manage social media accounts to build brand visibility and foster community engagement.
Create and optimize conversion-focused landing pages for campaigns and product highlights.
Regularly update and enhance website SEO, including keyword implementation, blog content, and backlink strategies.
Build, manage, and update websites using CMS platforms like WordPress, Webflow, or Shopify.
Support e-commerce operations by managing product listings, content updates, and promotional campaigns on Shopify or similar platforms.
Conduct cold outreach and appointment setting via phone, email, and online directories.
Use LinkedIn and other platforms for B2B lead generation and prospecting.
Leverage tools such as Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, CRM systems, and email marketing platforms for data-driven decisions.
Work independently and collaboratively in a remote, fast-paced environment.

Requirements:

Proven experience in digital marketing strategy, content creation, and performance analysis.
Strong hands-on skills in SEO, paid advertising (Facebook, Instagram, Google), email marketing, and social media management.
Experience with e-commerce platforms and online product marketing.
Skilled in website building and content management systems (WordPress, Webflow, etc.).
Ability to create, update, and optimize landing pages for marketing campaigns.
Familiarity with SEO best practices, keyword research, blogging, and backlink strategies.
Experience with analytics and marketing platforms such as Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, and CRM systems.
Prior experience in appointment setting and lead outreach through digital channels.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with attention to detail.
Highly organized, self-motivated, and results-driven.
Prior experience in B2B marketing and cold calling is a strong advantage.

Why Join SelfBuild3D?

???? Competitive Compensation – We value your expertise and pay fairly
???? Career Growth – As we expand, so do your opportunities
???? Remote Work – Enjoy the flexibility of working from home
???? Ongoing Training – Weekly learning sessions to level up your skills
???? Positive Team Culture – Collaborative, friendly, and professional environment

Job Type: Full-time
Pay: $4 – $6 / hour
Schedule: 8-hour shift
Benefits: Work from home

TO APPLY
